models.name: shopping_mall_channels
models.description: Defines the organizational channels within the shopping mall platform. Channels represent major business divisions or market segments that contain multiple sections. Each channel has hierarchical capabilities for nesting and manages its own branding, configuration, and operational parameters. {@link shopping_mall_sections} are organized within channels to create a structured marketplace environment.

foreignFields.name: parent_id
foreignFields.description: Parent channel for hierarchical organization. Enables nested channel structures. {@link shopping_mall_channels.id}

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique business identifier for the channel. Used for API references and system integration.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Display name of the channel shown to users and administrators.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed description explaining the channel's purpose and business context.

plainFields.name: logo_url
plainFields.description: Channel branding logo image URL for visual identification.

plainFields.name: banner_url
plainFields.description: Header banner image URL for channel presentation.

plainFields.name: display_order
plainFields.description: Sort order for channel display in listings and navigation.

plainFields.name: is_active
plainFields.description: Indicates whether the channel is currently active and visible.

plainFields.name: is_visible
plainFields.description: Controls visibility of the channel in public interfaces.

plainFields.name: metadata
plainFields.description: JSON structured data for channel-specific configurations and extensions.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the channel was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the channel was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the channel was soft deleted. Null if active.

models.name: shopping_mall_sections
models.description: Organizational sections that group related content within channels. Sections provide logical segmentation within channels for better content organization and user navigation. Each section belongs to a specific channel and can contain products, categories, or other platform components. {@link shopping_mall_channels}

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_channel_id

plainFields.name: code

plainFields.description: Display name of the section for user interfaces.

plainFields.name: icon_url
plainFields.description: Icon image URL for section visual representation.

plainFields.name: background_url
plainFields.description: Background image URL for section presentation.

plainFields.name: display_order
plainFields.description: Sort order for section display within its channel.

plainFields.name: is_active
plainFields.description: Indicates whether the section is active and operational.

plainFields.name: is_featured
plainFields.description: Marks the section as featured for prominent display.

plainFields.name: access_level
plainFields.description: Access control level for section visibility and permissions.

plainFields.name: metadata
plainFields.description: JSON structured data for section-specific configurations.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the section was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the section was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the section was soft deleted. Null if active.
